title: Ukrainian Refugees Forced Onto Streets After Hungarian Asylum Rule Change
content: The move has already led to evictions from private shelters, with around 2,000-3,000 refugees potentially losing their housing.
summary: The move has already led to evictions from private shelters, with around 2,000-3,000 refugees potentially losing their housing.

title: TikTok Ban Lifted In Nepal, Was Suspended For Disturbing "Social Harmony"
content: Nepal on Thursday lifted its ban on TikTok nine months after suspending the popular video-sharing platform for disturbing "social harmony", the communications minister said.
summary: Nepal on Thursday lifted its ban on TikTok nine months after suspending the popular video-sharing platform for disturbing "social harmony", the communications minister said.

title: Bangladesh's Interim Government Revokes Sheikh Hasina's Diplomatic Passport
content: Bangladesh's interim government revoked the diplomatic passport of ousted premier Sheikh Hasina on Thursday, after she fled a student-led uprising by helicopter to India earlier this month.
summary: Bangladesh's interim government revoked the diplomatic passport of ousted premier Sheikh Hasina on Thursday, after she fled a student-led uprising by helicopter to India earlier this month.

title: $1,500 Cash Reward For "Vampire" Serial Killer Who Escaped Kenyan Prison
content: Kenyan police offered a cash reward on Thursday for information leading to the arrest of a suspected serial killer who escaped from a Nairobi police cell.
summary: Kenyan police offered a cash reward on Thursday for information leading to the arrest of a suspected serial killer who escaped from a Nairobi police cell.

title: Singapore Detects 13 Cases Of Mpox Clade 2 Infection
content: Singapore has detected 13 cases of mpox Clade 2 infections this year, the health ministry said in a bulletin on Thursday.
summary: Singapore has detected 13 cases of mpox Clade 2 infections this year, the health ministry said in a bulletin on Thursday.

title: Bangladesh's Interim Government Seeks $1 Billion From World Bank
content: Bangladesh's interim government has sought $1 billion from the World Bank as budgetary support.
summary: Bangladesh's interim government has sought $1 billion from the World Bank as budgetary support.

title: 6 Killed, 11 Injured In Hotel Fire In South Korea: Report
content: A fire at a hotel in South Korea killed six people and injured 11 others, Yonhap news agency reported on Thursday, citing fire authorities.
summary: A fire at a hotel in South Korea killed six people and injured 11 others, Yonhap news agency reported on Thursday, citing fire authorities.

title: Romanian Prosecutors Ask Court To Extend Andrew Tate's Detention
content: Romanian prosecutors have requested that Andrew Tate be detained for 30 more days, the internet personality's representative said on Thursday.
summary: Romanian prosecutors have requested that Andrew Tate be detained for 30 more days, the internet personality's representative said on Thursday.

title: Chinese Scientists Use Lunar Soil To Generate Water In New Method: Report
content: Chinese scientists have discovered a "brand-new method" of producing large quantities of water using lunar soil brought back from a 2020 expedition, state broadcaster CCTV reported on Thursday.
summary: Chinese scientists have discovered a "brand-new method" of producing large quantities of water using lunar soil brought back from a 2020 expedition, state broadcaster CCTV reported on Thursday.

title: Putin Manipulated Donald Trump's Ego And Insecurities, Claims New Book
content: In his upcoming memoir retired US Army Lieutenant General Herbert Raymond McMaster alleges that Russian President Vladimir Putin manipulated former President Donald Trump by exploiting his ego.
summary: In his upcoming memoir retired US Army Lieutenant General Herbert Raymond McMaster alleges that Russian President Vladimir Putin manipulated former President Donald Trump by exploiting his ego.

title: PM Modi To Visit Ukraine, Poland PM Talks Of India's Role In Resolving War
content: PM Modi Ukraine Visit: A day ahead of Prime Minister Narendra Modi's much-anticipated visit to conflict-hit Ukraine, Poland Prime Minister Donald Tusk said India could play an essential and constructive role in resolving the Russia-Ukraine war.
summary: PM Modi Ukraine Visit: A day ahead of Prime Minister Narendra Modi's much-anticipated visit to conflict-hit Ukraine, Poland Prime Minister Donald Tusk said India could play an essential and constructive role in resolving the Russia-Ukraine war.

title: "New Variant": 171 Confirmed Mpox Cases Recorded In This Nation
content: Burundi has confirmed 171 cases of mpox, the health minister said on Thursday, following confirmation of the first cases in the country last month.
summary: Burundi has confirmed 171 cases of mpox, the health minister said on Thursday, following confirmation of the first cases in the country last month.

title: Asia's 1st Known Case Of New Deadlier Mpox Strain Confirmed In Thailand
content: Asia's first known case of a new, deadlier Mpox virus strain has been confirmed in Thailand. The patient who has been tested positive for the new strain landed in Bangkok on August 14.
summary: Asia's first known case of a new, deadlier Mpox virus strain has been confirmed in Thailand. The patient who has been tested positive for the new strain landed in Bangkok on August 14.

title: One Of World's Largest Diamonds, 2,492-Carat Stone, Found In Botswana
content: One of the world's largest diamonds ever unearthed -- a rough 2,492-carat stone -- has been found in Botswana, a Canadian mining company that discovered the gem announced.
summary: One of the world's largest diamonds ever unearthed -- a rough 2,492-carat stone -- has been found in Botswana, a Canadian mining company that discovered the gem announced.

title: Tim Walz's Flannel Fashion Sense Wins Praise From Barack Obama
content: Minnesota Governor Tim Walz may not have been present at the Democratic National Convention on Tuesday evening, but his fashion sense was certainly felt.
summary: Minnesota Governor Tim Walz may not have been present at the Democratic National Convention on Tuesday evening, but his fashion sense was certainly felt.

title: Opinion: Modi In Ukraine: Playing 'Mediator' May Not Be Feasible For India
content: The issue is whether it is opportune to reach out to Central and East European countries at this moment when both Ukraine and Poland are locked up in a military confrontation with Russia as front-line states with US and NATO support.
summary: The issue is whether it is opportune to reach out to Central and East European countries at this moment when both Ukraine and Poland are locked up in a military confrontation with Russia as front-line states with US and NATO support.

title: Actor Mindy Kaling Endorses Kamala Harris, Shares Heartfelt Story
content: On the third night of the Democratic National Convention, actress and producer Mindy Kaling captivated the audience with her heartfelt support for Kamala Harris' presidential campaign.
summary: On the third night of the Democratic National Convention, actress and producer Mindy Kaling captivated the audience with her heartfelt support for Kamala Harris' presidential campaign.

title: PM Modi Meets Polish Counterpart Donald Tusk, Discusses Bilateral Ties
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi today met his Polish counterpart Donald Tusk and discussed ways to strengthen bilateral ties.
summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi today met his Polish counterpart Donald Tusk and discussed ways to strengthen bilateral ties.

title: NDTV Ground Report: Human Cost Of The Unending Russia-Ukraine War
content: The Russia-Ukraine conflict rages on, entering its 31st month, with no end in sight. The battle for Bakhmut, a crucial Ukrainian city, has been one of the most intense, leaving destruction and devastation in its wake on both sides.
summary: The Russia-Ukraine conflict rages on, entering its 31st month, with no end in sight. The battle for Bakhmut, a crucial Ukrainian city, has been one of the most intense, leaving destruction and devastation in its wake on both sides.

title: 5 Bodies Recovered In UK Tycoon Shipwreck, Divers Seek Last Missing Person
content: Searches resumed Thursday for the last person missing after a superyacht carrying UK tech tycoon Mike Lynch sank off Sicily, with divers recovering a fifth body from the wreck.
summary: Searches resumed Thursday for the last person missing after a superyacht carrying UK tech tycoon Mike Lynch sank off Sicily, with divers recovering a fifth body from the wreck.
